name: Kingdom Runners
description:
WASD FOR MOVING, LEFT MOUSE FOR SWORD.

With space and/ or mouse u can go through the chat boxes.  

Play as king choosen by a wizard to find his staff, but later they found out this king is horrible and now is time to fix what u started and become king yourself.

there's other controls but they are half finish since I didnt had the time, so stick with the wasd or arrow keys setting.  am 7-8 months into unity right now, so am still a newbie at this lol, anyways but here is my take at a game jam. 

made from sunday 12 to sunday 19 at like 5:40 am (yes am staying up late making a page for the game )

[if u want to restart the progression, press esc while playing and click the button restart progression]
